item.title: Course Handouts
item.dc:creator: Default admin account

item.title: Cosmetic Checklist
item.description:
To help us serve you better, I have put together a checklist of the items needed to complete a cosmetic case:

  1. Photos of pre-op teeth with shade guide, 1:1 , 1:2 from different angles.
  2. Photos of preps with stump shade tabs.
  3. Photos of temporaries, full face including eyes, also 1:2.
item.dc:creator: Default admin account

item.title: Fundamental rules of Anterior Aesthetics
item.description:
1. Arch curvature. Does the curvature of the anteriors blend with that of posteriors when viewed from the incisal edge?
  2. Inclination of facial plane of teeth when viewed from the side should be the same as natural teeth on either side.
item.dc:creator: Default admin account

item.title: Bite Recovery Handout
item.description:
1. New poly-vinyl impressions of provisional restorations are taken
  2. New face bow of provisional may be taken or original face bow mounting of prepared teeth may be used,
  3. New posterior bite registrotions are token of the unprepared molars with provisionals in place.
  4. Anterior provisional to pro

item.title: CMR Dental Lab | Welcome to Team Aesthetics
item.description: Team Aesthethics is excited to be offering several new educational products. Our Video On Demand will feature technique modules for any of the different materials we work with, along with comprehensive overviews of clinical cases. View this introductory video to see how you can benefit from our online courses.
